short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that saves a user's browsing history that enables insights.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This browser downloads your browser history and stores it in your Meetrics app so that you can get personalized insights and recommendations based on you and your friends' behavior.
